column4: Can you get  java for amd64 ubuntu or does it not matter that much if you get a 32 bit version ?
you can get Java just fine, but not the sun Java web browser plugin
the reason I ask is I saw x64 from java ,but it says it is for Suse and Red hat so I am confused about if I can get it for ubuntu.
I've never tried it in Ubuntu but I have seen it on other distributions, Java itself runs fine but not Java applets from a web browser
